items.question: When does an instructional material become less effective?

choices.text: When it increases the time normally spent in learning
When more students understand what is taught

items.question: Which statement best shows what educational technology is all about?

choices.text: Education technology involves primarily the designing of aspects of the teaching learning process, using available, appropriate resources
Educational technology concerns itself with development, application, and evaluation of materials to improve learning and teaching

mount all photographs on the board

items.question: Which statements show that the instructional material used has been LEAST helpful in the teaching-learning process?

choices.text: When it increased the degree of mastery of learning
When it increased the time for learners to master the lesson

items.question:
Which of the following would be the primary advantage of using a computer simulation system as the basis of instruction?

II. Using computer simulation software makes it easy to evaluate student progress.
III. Computer simulation systems facilitate self-paced learning.
